A Website

by junyichong

Hi! I am Jun Yi.

Chong is my last name. Call me Jun Yi, or Chong, or Jun if you like. I'm a mechanical engineering student having fun in Japan sponsored (not really) by the Malaysian government.

Check out my resume if you are into that kind of stuff.

Note to self

Seek discomfort

No one is above learning a new lesson

Be Confident, Stay Grounded

It's never too late to start

Don't sweat the unchangeable

Do important things

About this website

Originally built with Django and deployed to Heroku.
Now modified with Chulapa Jekyll theme and hosted on GitHub Pages.
15 usd/year domain name from Namecheap.

Made possible by tutorials on YouTube. Published during the Covid-19 pandemic.
Come back again in some time, junyichong.com will only get better!
Thanks for visiting.
